lo23.communication.handle
Class HandleMessage

java.lang.Object
  lo23.communication.handle.HandleMessage

public class HandleMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Class which contains the handle for send and receive a message. see HandleReceiveMessage and HandleSendMessage
